name: Cyberghost
description:
Congratulations on possesing our first target! This feat will surely make taking over the base easier.

Rememeber that you have influence over their minds only for several seconds before they start to regain their consciousness. And people tend to hurt themselves when struggling to get out of your control.

Try to transfer your consciousness to new hosts as often as possible if we want our operation to go well.

Leave no survivors and good luck.

Instructions:

- WSAD movement for directions.

- Left click to shoot.

- Hold right click to transfer yourself to another nearby host. 

- To advance kill/possess every solider in the room and proceed to the marked point.

- You get to shoot one bullet per host, aim is crucial.

- Watch out as you can only stay in one host for limited amount of time - you will gradually loose control and die eventually.
